#load dplyr

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

## load mtcars

```{r}
data(mtcars)
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% select(mpg, cyl, hp) %>%
  group_by(cyl) %>%
  summarise(count=n(), mean_mpg = mean(mpg))
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% select(mpg, cyl, hp) %>% tidyr::gather(1:3)
```
